name: Google Play and iOS App Store data
title: Google Play and iOS App Store data
description: The most comprehensive API for global app store data. Access app data for all Google Play and iOS App Store apps in 155 countries including 6 years of historical data.

endpoints.name: App IDs for all apps
endpoints.description: Get a list of all the app IDs for iTunes App Store or Google Play Store.

endpoints.name: Reviews for all apps
endpoints.description: Request most recent app reviews dump. This is a bulk API call, returning a streaming response with one record per line.

endpoints.name: Details for all apps
endpoints.description: Request the most recent app details for all apps.
